data.text: @CharlesRCherry Well give your blessings to your poor neighbors then. There are plenty of them.

@RudyAlsem @SilverChartist Yes, the needs are many and widespread. My area of focus is Myanmar, but I know there are poor all over the world. We have to do what we can where we can with as much as we can for as long as we can.

@ThatVolGuy Not asking for help from the US government, in fact I don't want the US to get involved. I'm reaching out to individuals who have a heart for the poor and needy. As a Christian I don't have the option of turning a blind eye to the poor because of politics. Blessings to you.
@CharlesRCherry US catches crap from around the globe for what we do, don’t do, how we manage both, etc. Let the fine upstanding countries of Asia take care of their own if they are of any decency.
@CharlesRCherry @SilverChartist Sad true. And nobody is talking about this 😡
@CharlesRCherry @SilverChartist Higher calling = our motto at SilverChartist - - - let's pursue it!!
